tool_description: Generates geographic heatmaps and density visualizations from location data to identify high-traffic areas and spatial patterns.

location_data.description: Array of location coordinates with optional weights

map_bounds.description: Geographic bounds as [min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon]

resolution_level.description: Heatmap resolution: low, medium, high, or ultra

heatmap_type.description: Visualization type: density, frequency, or weighted

error_messages: Insufficient location data: Provide at least 10 location points for heatmap generation.
Invalid map bounds: Ensure bounds array contains 4 valid coordinates [min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon].
Invalid resolution level: Use one of [low, medium, high, ultra].
Unsupported heatmap type: Use one of [density, frequency, weighted].
usage: Provide location_data and map_bounds arrays; optionally specify resolution_level and heatmap_type. Returns heatmap visualization data and density statistics.

heatmap_data.description: Heatmap visualization data in JSON format

density_statistics.description: Array of density statistics for different geographic regions

hotspot_locations.description: Array of identified high-density hotspot coordinates

coverage_area_sqkm.description: Total area covered by the heatmap in square kilometers
